channel.title: Quest for Knowledge
channel.description:
Hello all, I was wondering if there were any people out there who would be so kind as to explain to me how some things work.
In the past I have "coded" (< a very loose term of the word) and hosted a private server here and so I know the basics of how everything is setup and laid out. One thing that I never understood was the Client and exactly how it works. Surely if I were to download a decompiled client I should find 3d models of all of the charactors, maps and scenery etc but that isnt the case - I guess im just asking how the client works and whether or not my understanding of "Client = Items/Objects/Models and Server = Placing/Positioning/Coding" was accurate or not.
It's a bit of a noob question, I know so thanks in advance and sorry for the slightly unrelated topic.

item.title: Quest for Knowledge
item.dc:creator: @the_cow_slay the cow slay
item.description:
@the_cow_slay wrote:

Hello all, I was wondering if there were any people out there who would be so kind as to explain to me how some things work.

In the past I have “coded” (< a very loose term of the word) and hosted a private server here and so I know the basics of how everything is setup and laid out. One thing that I never understood was the Client and exactly how it works. Surely if I were to download a decompiled client I should find 3d models of all of the charactors, maps and scenery etc but that isnt the case - I guess im just asking how the client works and whether or not my understanding of “Client = Items/Objects/Models and Server = Placing/Positioning/Coding” was accurate or not.

It’s a bit of a noob question, I know so thanks in advance and sorry for the slightly unrelated topic.
